name: Scarbacks
agenda: Free their comrades from the pits.

name: Gorger's Sommeliers
agenda: Acquire the body of a beast, living or dead.

name: Shrikes
agenda: Put a stop to the inventory discrepencies in Fabrication.

name: The Youngers
description: upstart thugs with something to prove
agenda: Help them oust the Scarbacks and be the strongest gang in Fab.

name: Moore's
agenda: Help them collect overdue debts and deliver overdue promises.
